mapper.select: SELECT user_name, club_name, TRUNCATE(AVG(game_score),1) AS game_avg, COUNT(*) AS game_count, SUM( CASE WHEN game_all_cover = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS game_all_cover, SUM( CASE WHEN game_twohundred_over = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS game_twohundred_over, SUM( CASE WHEN game_score = 300 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS game_perfect, MAX(game_score) AS game_high FROM user ur INNER JOIN club_member cm ON ur.user_no = cm.user_no INNER JOIN club cb ON cb.club_no = cm.club_no INNER JOIN game gm ON ur.user_no = gm.user_no AND cb.club_no = gm.club_no WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY ur.user_name, cb.club_name, gm.user_no, gm.club_no;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO game (user_no, club_no, shop_no, game_type, game_month, game_score, game_all_cover, game_twohundred_over, game_regist_date) VALUES (#{userNo}, #{clubNo}, #{shopNo}, #{gameType}, #{gameMonth}, #{gameScore}, #{gameAllCover}, #{gameTwohundredOver}, #{gameRegistDate})
